data.title: Queer TV star, retired athlete make it official and more debuts
data.meta_description: See how some of Hollywood's most well-known couples officially announced their relationships to the world.
data.text:
_

See how some of Hollywood's most famous current and former couples made their official red carpet debuts, starting with this duo…

Ashlyn Harris and Sophia Bush made their red carpet debut as a couple at the White House Correspondents' Association Dinner in Washington, D.C., on April 27, 2024.

The former U.S. women's national team soccer star and the "One Tree Hill" actress were first linked in 2023 as both were going through public divorces — Ashlyn from fellow soccer star Ali Krieger and Sophia from businessman Grant Hughes.

Their red carpet debut came a few days after Sophia publicly came out as queer.

Keep reading for more famous couples' red carpet debuts…

MORE: Follow Wonderwall on MSN for more fun celebrity & entertainment photo galleries and content

_

Hollywood icon Jack Nicholson's look-alike son Ray Nicholson made his red carpet debut as a couple with Victoria's Secret Angel Sara Sampaio at the Vanity Fair Oscar Party in Beverly Hills on March 10, 2024.

The young actor and the Portuguese model were first linked in the summer of 2023.

_

A year after they were first linked, actor-screenwriter Justin Theroux and "The Gilded Age" actress Nicole Brydon Bloom made their red carpet debut as a couple at the Vanity Fair Oscar Party in Beverly Hills on March 10, 2024.

It marks Justin's first public romance since he was married to Jennifer Aniston, from whom he split in 2017.

MORE: Couples with big age gaps

_

Jonathan Majors and Meagan Good made their red carpet debut as a couple at the AAFCA Special Achievement Honorees Luncheon in Los Angeles on March 3, 2024.

The controversial Marvel actor and the "Shazam!" actress took their relationship to the next level in the spring of 2023 — just a little more than a year after she and DeVon Franklin called it quits following nearly a decade of marriage. At the time, Jonathan was well into his legal battle with an ex who alleged that he assaulted and harassed her. In late 2023, a jury found him guilty. In April 2024, he was sentenced to probation and ordered to complete a year-long counseling program.

MORE: Couples who look alike

_

Country music star Zach Bryan and Barstool Sports host Brianna Chickenfry (real name: Brianna LaPaglia) made their red carpet debut together at the 66th Annual Grammy Awards in Los Angeles on Feb. 4, 2024.

They were first linked in the summer of 2023.

_

Dove Cameron and Damiano David made their red carpet debut as a couple at the annual pre-Grammy Gala presented by Clive Davis and the Recording Academy in Beverly Hills on Feb. 3, 2024.

The Disney Channel alum and the Grammy-nominated rocker — he fronts the Italian rock band Måneskin — first sparked romance rumors in September 2023.

_

Scottish DJ-producer Calvin Harris and his wife, TV and radio presenter Vick Hope, made their red carpet debut as a couple at the 66th Annual Grammy Awards in Los Angeles on Feb. 4, 2024 — about five months after they reportedly tied the knot.

_

Finally! Though they'd been together for nearly three years at this point, John Mulaney and Olivia Munn didn't make their red carpet debut together until they attended the 14th Governors Awards in Los Angeles on Jan. 9, 2024.

The comedian and former "Saturday Night Live" writer and the "Newsroom" actress went public with their relationship in 2021 and welcomed their first child together later that same year.

_

A week after she was released from prison, where she was serving time for her role in her mother's murder, famed Munchausen by proxy victim Gypsy Rose Blanchard made her red carpet debut with her new husband, Ryan Anderson — a special education teacher from Louisiana — at the premiere of the documentary "The Prison Confessions of Gypsy Rose Blanchard" in New York City on Jan. 5, 2024.

The couple married while Gypsy Rose was behind bars in the summer of 2022 after striking up a friendship that turned into more while exchanging letters.

_

"True Blood" and "Magic Mike" actor Joe Manganiello and "Winning Time" actress Caitlin O'Connor made their red carpet debut as a couple at the Children of Armenia Fund Gala at Cipriani in New York City on Dec. 9, 2023, where Joe was presented with the COAF Humanitarian Award.

Their romance was revealed in September 2023 — they reportedly met in a hot tub at a "Winning Time" premiere afterparty — a few months after Joe filed to divorce actress Sofia Vergara after seven years of marriage.

_

T.J. Holmes and Amy Robach finally made their red carpet debut as a couple at KIIS FM's iHeartRadio Jingle Ball 2023 presented by Capital One at the Kia Forum in Inglewood, California, on Dec. 1, 2023.

The public outing came a year after the pair, who launched a podcast together in December 2023, made headlines when it emerged that they were quietly dating — and allegedly had been having an affair while married to other people (they've denied that) — which led both to lose their jobs co-hosting "Good Morning America."

_

Brandon Davis and Ashley Benson made their red carpet debut as a couple at Vas J Morgan and Michael Braun's Halloween Party in West Hollywood on Oct. 28, 2023.

The "Pretty Little Liars" actress and the heir to a multi-billion-dollar oil empire just went public with their romance in January 2023.

In July, they announced that they'd gotten engaged, and in October — in the wake of news that they're expecting first child together — it emerged that they'd quietly tied the knot.

_

Oscar-nominated filmmaker Tim Burton and Italian screen siren Monica Bellucci made their official red carpet debut as a couple at the 18th Rome Film Festival premiere of "Diabolik chi sei?" — in which she stars — at the Auditorium Parco della Musica in Rome on Oct. 19, 2023.

They were first romantically linked in early 2023 when Paris Match published photos of the writer-director — who previously romanced talented beauties Helena Bonham Carter and Lisa Marie — and the "Spectre" actress walking arm-in-arm. They reportedly connected at the Lumière Film Festival in Lyon, France, in October 2022 when Monica, who shares two daughters with ex-husband Vincent Cassel, presented him with the festival's lifetime achievement award.

_

Jane Seymour made her red carpet debut with musician John Zambetti at the grand opening of Sphere for a U2 concert in Las Vegas on Sept. 29, 2023.

A few days later, the former Bond girl and "Dr. Quinn, Medicine Woman" star also made things with John — a longtime member of the band the Malibooz — Instagram official, captioning a poolside pic with her new love, "I've never been happier."

Jane's romance with the rocker comes after she split with David Green after nine years of dating. In April 2023, Jane — who's been married and divorced four times — revealed she turned down a marriage proposal from the film producer, telling The Times, "I just said I would never put a number on his name," explaining that exchanging vows again "would be the most horrible thing in the world."

Her "Dr. Quinn" co-star and love interest, Joe Lando, told Jane in her Instagram comments, "It's great to see you, so happy John's a really nice guy. Good for you Miss Jane," to which the actress replied, "Thanks Joe means everything [coming] from you."

_

Zookeeper, conservationist and wildlife photographer Robert Irwin (the son of late "Crocodile Hunter" star Steve Irwin and his widow, Terri Irwin) and Rorie Buckley (the niece of late actor Heath Ledger — Rorie's mother is the Oscar winner's sister, Kate Ledger) made their red carpet debut as a couple at the Australian premiere of "Mission: Impossible – Dead Reckoning Part One" in Sydney on July 3, 2023. The young couple — who were both 19 at the time — were first romantically linked in late 2022.

In February 2024, they announced their split in a joint Instagram post, writing, "We wanted to share that we have decided to go our separate ways but profoundly appreciate all the time spent together and wish one another all the very best into the future."

"We wish to express the gratitude and respect we have for one another as we continue our journeys on different paths. We won't be commenting further on this, and really appreciate your respect and privacy at this time," they added.

_

NFL star Braxton Berrios and TikTok personality Alix Earle made their red carpet debut as a couple at the 2023 ESPY Awards in Hollywood on July 12, 2023 — just a few weeks after the Miami Dolphins player publicly denied rumors that he and Alix got together while he was still in a relationship with reality TV star Sophia Culpo, his former girlfriend of two years.

_

Nearly two years after they were first linked as a couple — and just a month after they welcomed daughter Gia Virginia Chen-De Niro — martial arts instructor Tiffany Chen and Oscar winner Robert De Niro made their red carpet debut as a couple at the "Killers of the Flower Moon" premiere during the 76th Cannes Film Festival in France on May 20, 2023.

_

On June 22, 2023, Mick Jagger and his girlfriend of nearly a decade — ballerina Melanie Hamrick, who's more than 40 years his junior — finally made their official red carpet debut as a couple at the gala premiere of the American Ballet Theater's production of "Like Water for Chocolate" in New York City. Just a few days earlier Melanie, who shares son Deveraux with the Rolling Stones frontman, shut down rumors that she and Mick are set to wed.

_

Dua Lipa and Romain Gavras made their red carpet debut as a couple at the "Omar La Fraise" premiere during the 76th Cannes Film Festival in France on May 19, 2023. The Grammy winner and the director's relationship first made headlines in February 2023. At the time, a source told The Sun that the singer started seeing the French filmmaker, who previously romanced music stars Rita Ora and M.I.A., several months earlier, adding that the pair "met each other's close circles over the [2022 holidays]."

_

Chase Stokes and Kelsea Ballerini made things official at the CMT Music Awards in Austin, Texas, on April 2, 2023. "I have a really hot date tonight," the country music star told CMT on the teal carpet before the awards show, which she co-hosted with Kane Brown. She and the "Outer Banks" actor have been dating since January 2023.

_

After several months of dating "Boy Meets World" actor Matthew Lawrence and TLC singer Rozonda "Chilli" Thomas made their red carpet debut as a couple at Lifetime and Verizon's Black Excellence Dinner: A Celebration of Female Creatives in Los Angeles on March 9, 2023. According to People magazine, the pair started dating in November 2022. The music star confirmed their romance in January 2023.

_

Lisa Rinna and Harry Hamlin's daughter, Delilah Belle Hamlin, took her relationship to the next level on June 1, 2023. The model-turned-musician attended the premiere of "The Crowded Room" with her actor beau, Henry Eikenberry, who stars in the AppleTV+ series and was previously seen on "Euphoria." The couple have been linked since March 2023.

_

Country singer and former "One Tree Hill" actress Jana Kramer and boyfriend Allan Russell — a Scottish pro soccer play who now coaches Britain's Norwich City FC — made their red carpet debut as a couple at the iHeartRadio Music Awards in Los Angeles on March 27, 2023, two months after they made their relationship Instagram official.

MORE: Celebrity couples who dress alike

_

Four months after confirming their romance, Oscar-winning actress and music icon Cher made her red carpet debut with record label executive Alexander Edwards — who's 40 years her junior — at the Versace Fall/Winter 2023 fashion show in West Hollywood on March 9, 2023. The pair's split was confirmed less than two months later.

_

Model Lori Harvey and actor Damson Idris — who were first romantically linked in late 2022 — made their red carpet debut as a couple at the season 6 premiere of his series "Snowfall" in Los Angeles on Feb. 15, 2023.

_

Demi Lovato and her boyfriend of about six months — Jordan Lutes, who performs as Jute$ — made their red carpet debut as a couple at Clive Davis' annual pre-Grammy Awards gala in Los Angeles on Feb. 4, 2023.

_

On Feb. 3, 2023, Lizzo made her red carpet debut as a couple with her boyfriend of about a year, Myke Wright, at Clive Davis' annual pre-Grammy Awards gala in Los Angeles. Later that night, she took to Instagram to "hard launch" their relationship by sharing a slideshow of PDA-packed pics from the A-list affair.

_

On Feb. 5, 2023 — just a few days after he finalized his divorce from his third wife — Babyface and his girlfriend of about a year, Rika Tischendorf, made their red carpet debut as a couple at the 2023 Grammy Awards in Los Angeles.

_

On Feb. 5, 2023, Taylor Hale and Joseph Abdin — who first connected on season 24 of "Big Brother" in the summer of 2022 — made their red carpet debut as a couple at the 2023 Grammy Awards in Los Angeles.

_

Travis Barker's 19-year-old son, model and musician Landon Barker, and his girlfriend of less than a year, 18-year-old TikTok personality and recent "Dancing With the Stars" champ Charli D'Amelio, made their official red carpet debut as a couple at Spotify's Best New Artist Party in Los Angeles on Feb. 2, 2023.

_

Two months after making their romance Instagram official, music star Charlie Puth and Brooke Sansone — a longtime family friend who works as a digital marketing and PR coordinator for a design consultancy, People magazine reported — made their red carpet debut as a couple at Clive Davis's Annual Pre-Grammy Gala in Los Angeles on Feb. 4, 2023.

_

Actor Luke Evans and his boyfriend Fran Tomas, a project manager from Spain, made their red carpet debut as a couple at the LuisaViaRoma for UNICEF Winter Gala at Emeraude in St. Barts on Dec. 29, 2022. They reportedly met in 2021 and went public with their romance in 2022.

_

"The Last Kingdom" star Alexander Dreymon and "Girls" and "Get Out" actress Allison Williams made their red carpet debut as a couple at the Hollywood premiere of her movie "M3GAN" on Dec. 7, 2022. The look-alike "Horizon Line" co-stars' first public outing happened about eight months after it was first revealed that they'd quietly started dating in late 2019 and had secretly welcomed a son in the winter of 2021. In a Dec. 9 Instagram post, Alexander confirmed that he and Allison are engaged.

_

Finally! On Dec. 3, 2022 — more than four years after their romance first made headlines — Suki Waterhouse and Robert Pattinson made it official at the Dior Fall 2023 Menswear presentation in Giza, Egypt. The duo were also photographed looking happier than ever while holding hands inside the event.

_

Australian actor Liam Hemsworth and Aussie model Gabriella Brooks made their red carpet debut as a couple at the Australian premiere of "Poker Face" in Sydney on Nov. 15, 2022 — nearly three years after it was revealed they were dating.

_

Billie Eilish and her new boyfriend, The Neighbourhood frontman Jesse Rutherford, hit their first red carpet as a couple just a few weeks after publicly confirming their romance, arriving at the 11th Annual LACMA Art + Film Gala at the Los Angeles County Museum of Art on Nov. 5, 2022, wrapped in a Gucci blanket and wearing head-to-toe looks by the fashion house. Their split was confirmed the following May.

_

In July 2022, Lindsay Lohan announced that she'd married financier Bader Shammas after a few years of dating and a 2021 engagement. The lovebirds finally made their red carpet debut as a couple at an event celebrating Lindsay's Netflix movie "Falling For Christmas" in New York City on Nov. 9, 2022.

_

A year and a half after their romance was made public, actor Henry Cavill and Natalie Viscuso, a Hollywood studio executive who oversees TV projects at Vertigo Entertainment, made their red carpet debut as a couple at the world premiere of his Netflix movie "Enola Holmes 2" in New York City on Oct. 28, 2022.

_

Oscar winner Russell Crowe and actress-turned-real estate agent Britney Theriot — who were first romantically linked in the fall of 2020 — made their red carpet debut as a couple at the premiere of "Poker Face" during the 17th Rome Film Festival at Auditorium della Conciliazione in Rome on Oct. 16, 2022. The pair's romance has made headlines due to their age gap.

_

Less than two weeks after their North Dakota wedding, actor Josh Duhamel and his new wife, Miss World America 2016 Audra Mari, walked their first red carpet as a couple at the Los Angeles premiere of his film "Bandit" on Sept. 21, 2022.

_

"The Bachelor" season 19 runner-up Becca Tilley sparked romance rumors with singer Hayley Kiyoko for years before they confirmed their romance in May 2022. That month, they opened up about their relationship on social media and took another big step — they attended the release party for Hayley's song "For The Girls" together. Four months later, the ladies made their first official red carpet debut at the iHeartRadio Music Festival in Las Vegas on Sept. 24, 2022.

_

Social media star and "Dance Moms" alum JoJo Siwa and new girlfriend Avery Cyrus made their red carpet debut as a couple at the opening night of "Jagged Little Pill" at the Pantages Theatre in Hollywood on Sept. 14 — just two days after JoJo confirmed speculation that she and the TikTok star were an item.

_

At the 74th Primetime Emmy Awards on Sept. 12, 2022, "The Flight Attendant" actress Kaley Cuoco — who finalized her divorce from second husband Karl Cook in June 2022 — posed for photos with her new man, "Ozark" actor Tom Pelphrey, on a red carpet for the first time. The duo went Instagram official a few months earlier.

_

"Friday Night Lights" and "The White Lotus" actress Connie Britton and her boyfriend of about a year, "This Is Us" writer-producer David Windsor, made their official red carpet debut as a couple at the HBO and HBO Max afterparty following the 2022 Emmy Awards.

_

"The Mummy" trilogy and "George of the Jungle" actor Brendan Fraser and girlfriend Jeanne Moore made their red carpet debut as a couple at the premiere of his lauded drama "The Whale" during the 79th Venice International Film Festival in Italy on Sept. 4, 2022.

_

That was fast! Just a month after they were spotted smooching in Mykonos, Greece, "Selling Sunset" star and real estate boss Jason Oppenheim and model Marie-lou Nurk made their red carpet debut as a couple at the world premiere of Netflix's "Day Shift" in Los Angeles on Aug. 10, 2022.

_

"Shang-Chi and the Legend of the Ten Rings" star Simu Liu and "Senior Year" actress Jade Bender confirmed their romance — they were first linked in June 2022 — when they hit the red carpet together for the first time at the ESPY Awards in Los Angeles on July 20, 2022. (Jade revealed a little more than their relationship while she was at it: She wore a sheer off-the-shoulder minidress for their big night.)

_

Nearly two months after making their romance public, actress-comedian Rosie O'Donnell and girlfriend Aimee Hauer — an LGBTQ+ influencer who frequently posts motivational and inspirational videos on TikTok — made their red carpet debut as a couple at the Stand Up for Friendly House comedy benefit in Los Angeles on July 16, 2022.

_

After a year of dating, Ryan Seacrest and girlfriend Aubrey Paige Petcosky, a model and Instagram influencer who's 23 years his junior, made their red carpet debut as a couple at the "Halftime" premiere during the Tribeca Film Festival in New York City on June 8, 2022.

_

Marvel actress Kat Dennings and her fiancée, musician Andrew W.K., posed on their first red carpet as a couple at the premiere of "Thor: Love and Thunder" in Hollywood on June 23, 2022 — a year after announcing their engagement in May 2021 just days after going public with their romance.

_

Comedy star Rob Riggle and professional golfer Kasia Kay first started popping up together in Instagram posts in the summer of 2021 in the wake of his bitter split from wife Tiffany, TMZ reported in July 2022. The former U.S. Marine and the athlete took their romance to the next level as things became "more serious," the webloid reported, when they hit the red carpet together for the first time at the Fourth Annual Critics Choice Real TV Awards in Los Angeles on June 12, 2022.

_

"The Marvelous Mrs. Maisel" star Michael Zegen and "Spring Awakening" actress Jennifer Damiano made their red carpet debut as a couple at the 75th Annual Tony Awards in New York City on June 12, 2022. It's unclear how long the pair had been dating at the time, but People magazine reported that the pair worked together on the 2020 off-Broadway musical adaptation of the 1969 film "Bob & Carol & Ted & Alice."

_

Liev Schreiber and girlfriend Taylor Neisen made their official red carpet debut as a couple at the Ali Forney Center's annual A Place at the Table gala at Cipriani Wall Street in New York City on May 13, 2022. The "Ray Donovan" star and the former beauty queen, who was Miss South Dakota 2012, have been a couple since late 2017.

_

"Dawson's Creek" alum Katie Holmes and her younger boyfriend — composer, producer and instrumentalist Bobby Wooten III, who's starred on Broadway — posed on their first red carpet as a couple at The Moth's 25th Anniversary Gala at Spring Studios in New York City on May 26, 2022. They were first seen together just one month earlier.

_

Kacey Musgraves and her boyfriend of about a year, Cole Schafer, made their red carpet debut as a couple at the Met Gala in New York City on May 2, 2022.

_

Six months after confirming there was a new woman in his life following his dramatic split from actress Alice Evans, Welsh actor Ioan Gruffudd and Australian actress Bianca Wallace stepped out to do their first red carpet together at The MS Society's SMS Battles Quiz event in London on May 12, 2022. It was a special night for the pair, as Bianca publicly revealed just a few months earlier that she has multiple sclerosis.

_

Actor Lewis Pullman and actress-musician Rainey Qualley, who performs under the name Rainsford, made their red carpet debut as a couple at the world premiere of his film "Top Gun: Maverick" in San Diego on May 4, 2022, after more than a year and a half of dating. Lewis is the son of actor Bill Pullman and his wife, dancer Tamara Hurwitz, and Rainey is the daughter of model-actress Andie MacDowell and her ex-husband, model Paul Qualley.

_

After more than two years of dating, Olympic gold medal-winning snowboarder Shaun White and actress Nina Dobrev finally did their first red carpet together on May 19, 2022, at the London premiere of "Top Gun: Maverick" — which happens to star one of her ex-boyfriends, Glen Powell, who was also in attendance.

_

On May 2, 2022 — more than two and a half years after James McAvoy and Lisa Liberati first sparked rumors that they'd secretly tied the knot — the "X-Men" franchise star and his second wife finally made their red carpet debut as a couple at the 2022 Met Gala in New York City.

_

Cindy Crawford and Rande Gerber's daughter, model-actress Kaia Gerber, made her red carpet debut as a couple with "Elvis" actor Austin Butler — who romanced Lily-Rose Depp and Olivia DeJonge after his breakup from Vanessa Hudgens following nearly a decade of coupledom — at the 2022 Met Gala in New York City on May 2, 2022. Kaia and Austin were first publicly linked just five months earlier in December 2021.

_

After about six months of dating, Pete Davidson and Kim Kardashian did their first red carpet as a couple at the White House Correspondents' Dinner in Washington, D.C., on April 30, 2022.

_

Michelle Dockery and fiancé Jasper Waller-Bridge — the younger brother of "Fleabag" and "Killing Eve" writer-producer Phoebe Waller-Bridge — posed on their first red carpet together at the premiere of her series "Anatomy of a Scandal" in London on April 14, 2022. The "Downton Abbey" actress and Jasper — who's worked in music management and is now a TV and film producer — started dating in 2019 and announced their engagement in January 2022.

_

"Twilight" hunk Taylor Lautner finally made it official with his fiancée, nurse Tay Dome! The star brought his beautiful future bride, whom he started dating in 2018, to the CMT Music Awards in Nashville on April 11, 2022, where they posed on the red carpet that was temporarily evacuated due to a lightning storm earlier that night.

_

Former "The Real Housewives of Orange County" star Braunwyn Windham-Burke and girlfriend Victoria Brito walked their first red carpet as a couple at the 33rd Annual GLAAD Media Awards in Los Angeles on April 2, 2022, four months after they were first publicly linked.

_

He moves fast! Just a few days after they were first spotted spending time together, Scott Disick and U.K.-based model Rebecca Donaldson made things red carpet official at the premiere of Hulu's "The Kardashians" — his ex Kourtney Kardashian's new reality TV show — in Los Angeles on April 7, 2022.

_

Musician Wolfgang Van Halen — the only child of late rock legend Eddie Van Halen and actress Valerie Bertinelli — made his red carpet debut with girlfriend Andraia Allsop at the Grammys in Las Vegas on April 3, 2022. Wolf has reportedly been in a relationship with the software engineer since 2015.

_

Nearly five years after they got married, Grammy-nominated singer-songwriter Mickey Guyton and husband Grant Savoy, an attorney, made their red carpet debut at the 64th Annual Grammy Awards in Las Vegas on April 3, 2022.

_

Nearly a year after they were first publicly linked, Anya Taylor-Joy and her boyfriend, musician Malcolm McRae, made their red carpet debut as a couple at the Vanity Fair Oscar Party at the Wallis Annenberg Center for the Performing Arts in Beverly Hills on March 27, 2022.

_

Chrissy Metz and her boyfriend of two and a half years, Bradley Collins, made their red carpet debut as a couple at the Elton John AIDS Foundation's 30th Annual Academy Awards Viewing Party in West Hollywood on March 27, 2022.

_

After several years of low-key coupledom, Jon Hamm and girlfriend Anna Osceola — who's 18 years younger than him — finally made their red carpet debut as a couple at the Vanity Fair Oscar Party at the Wallis Annenberg Center for the Performing Arts in Beverly Hills on March 27, 2022.

_

A little more than a year after they were first linked, Michael B. Jordan and Lori Harvey made their red carpet debut as a couple at the Vanity Fair Oscar Party at the Wallis Annenberg Center for the Performing Arts in Beverly Hills on March 27, 2022.

_

Sofia Richie and her boyfriend of about a year, Elliot Grainge, made their red carpet debut as a couple at the Elton John AIDS Foundation's 30th Annual Academy Awards Viewing Party in West Hollywood on March 27, 2022. They got engaged less than a month later.

_

Donald Glover and his long-term partner, Michelle White, made their debut as a couple at the Vanity Fair Oscar Party at the Wallis Annenberg Center for the Performing Arts in Beverly Hills on March 27, 2022.

_

After a little more than a year of dating — and nearly four months after they went public with their romance — Casey Affleck and his much younger actress girlfriend, Caylee Cowan, hit the red carpet together for the first time at Darren Dzienciol and Richie Akiva's pre-Oscar party in Los Angeles's Bel Air neighborhood on March 26, 2022.

_

A little more than a year after they started dating, actress Lily James and Queens of the Stone Age bassist Michael Shuman made their red carpet debut as a couple at the Chanel and Charles Finch Pre-Oscar Awards Dinner at the Polo Lounge in Beverly Hills on March 26, 2022.

_

Marvel star Brie Larson and actor-director boyfriend Elijah Allan-Blitz — who were first publicly linked romantically in the summer of 2019 — waited nearly three years to make things red carpet official. They're seen here posing for photos as a couple on the red carpet for the first time at the Chanel and Charles Finch Pre-Oscar Awards Dinner at the Polo Lounge in Beverly Hills on March 26, 2022.

_

Less than two months after they were first romantically linked in February 2022, Sienna Miller and her much younger boyfriend, model-actor Oli Green, made their red carpet debut together at the Chanel and Charles Finch Pre-Oscar Awards Dinner at the Polo Lounge in Beverly Hills on March 26, 2022.

_

Talulah Riley and Thomas Brodie-Sangster, who were first publicly linked in August 2021, made their red carpet debut as a couple at the BAFTA Gala Dinner in London on March 11, 2022. The former "Love Actually" child actor — who later starred on "Game of Thrones" and "The Queen's Gambit" — and the "Westworld" actress — who was previously married to Elon Musk (twice!) — apparently connected while shooting an upcoming miniseries about the Sex Pistols.

_

Six months after they tied the knot in September 2021 following a courtship of more than two years, "Emily in Paris" star Lily Collins and her hubby, filmmaker Charlie McDowell, finally made their official red carpet debut as a couple at a special screening of "Windfall" — which he wrote, directed and produced and in which she stars — in West Hollywood on March 11, 2022. The mostly private duo had been seen together in public several times over the years, though they'd never posed together in an official capacity.

_

More than two and a half years after they were first publicly linked, Kristen Stewart and her fiancé, screenwriter Dylan Meyer, finally made their official debut as a couple on the red carpet at the 27th Annual Critics Choice Awards in Los Angeles on March 13, 2022. The "Spencer" star revealed in late 2021 that they'd gotten engaged.

RELATED: Celebrity couples who dress alike

_

Millie Bobby Brown and her boyfriend of about a year — Jake Bongiovi, the son of rocker Jon Bon Jovi — made a glamorous first official appearance as a couple at the 75th EE British Academy Film Awards at London's Royal Albert Hall on March 13, 2022. The teens were first publicly linked in early 2021.

_

On Feb. 27, 2022 — nearly five years after they were first publicly linked in the summer of 2017 — former "Gypsy" co-stars Billy Crudup and Naomi Watts finally made their red carpet debut as a couple at the 28th Annual Screen Actors Guild Awards.

_

Just three weeks after they met, Kanye West and his then-new girlfriend, actress Julia Fox, made their red carpet debut — in matching denim looks, no less — at the Kenzo Fall-Winter 2022/2023 Menswear fashion show in Paris on Jan. 23, 2022. They called it quits just a few weeks later.

_

Despite making their relationship Instagram official in early 2021 and attending some "Dancing With the Stars" events together during their run as a duo on the hit show, Sharna Burgess and Brian Austin Green didn't actually make their red carpet debut until December! The pair attended the World Choreography Awards at the Globe Theatre in Los Angeles on Dec. 13, 2021, and marked their first time posing on the red carpet as a couple.

_

Tom Hiddleston and girlfriend Zawe Ashton finally made their red carpet debut as a couple at UNICEF UK's The Blue Moon Gala in London on Dec. 8, 2021. It's the first time the "Betrayal" co-stars — who were first romantically linked more than two years earlier — have posed together in an official capacity without colleagues or friends by their sides.

_

Comedians Jo Koy and Chelsea Handler — who went public with their romance in September 2021 — made their red carpet debut as a couple at the People's Choice Awards a few months later on Dec. 7, 2021.

RELATED: Celeb couples who first connected on social media

_

Four months after they quietly tied the knot, "Saturday Night Live" and "The Last Man on Earth" alum Will Forte and wife Olivia Modling walked their first red carpet as a couple at the premiere of his Peacock comedy series "MacGruber," which is based on his "MacGyver" parody movie of the same name, in Los Angeles on Dec. 8, 2021.

_

"Sex/Life" stars Adam Demos and Sarah Shahi took their steamy on-screen love affair off screen after linking up on the set of their Netflix series. They made their real-life relationship public in December 2020, but it wasn't until the 2021 People's Choice Awards on Dec. 7, 2021, that they made it red carpet official.

_

Jonah Hill and girlfriend Sarah Brady — a surf instructor and student at the University of California San Diego — used the premiere of his Netflix film "Don't Look Up" in New York City on Dec. 5, 2021, to make their red carpet debut, in matching ice blue suits and satin slides, no less! The couple went Instagram official in September 2021 after first being romantically linked earlier that summer.

_

"Dancing With the Stars" pro Gleb Savchenko and his girlfriend of a few months, Elena Belle, hit their first red carpet as a couple at the 2021 People's Choice Awards on Dec. 7, 2021.

_

Grammy-winning producer Mark Ronson and actress Grace Gummer — the daughter of movie star Meryl Streep and artist Don Gummer — appeared on their first red carpet together about four months after they tied the knot. The couple chose the "Slave Play" Broadway re-opening night performance in New York City on Dec. 2, 2021, for their debut.

_

Romeo Beckham — the second son of Victoria Beckham and David Beckham — and model Mia Regan made their red carpet debut as a couple at The Fashion Awards at London's Royal Albert Hall on Nov. 29, 2021, after about two years of dating.

_

Musician Jordan McGraw — whose dad is TV personality Dr. Phil — and wife Morgan Stewart, a "Rich Kids of Beverly Hills" alum, made their red carpet debut as a couple at the Baby2Baby 10-Year Gala on Nov. 13, 2021 — nearly a year after they tied the knot in December 2020. The event also marked the red carpet debut of Morgan's second baby bump.

_

"Ex's & Oh's" singer Elle King and Dan Tooker — who got engaged on their first anniversary in October 2020 and welcomed a baby, son Lucky Levi, in September 2021 — made their official red carpet debut as a couple at the 2021 CMA Awards in Nashville on Oct. 10, 2021.

_

Weeks after announcing their marriage, expectant actress Christina Ricci and celebrity hairstylist Mark Hampton walked their first red carpet together at the premiere of her series "Yellowjackets" in Los Angeles on Nov. 10, 2021.

_

On Nov. 10, 2021, Vanessa Hudgens and her boyfriend of a year, professional baseball player Cole Tucker, made their red carpet debut as a couple at the AFI Fest opening night premiere of "Tick, Tick… Boom!" — in which she stars.

_

After more than a year of questions about the nature of their relationship, Paul Mescal and Phoebe Bridgers confirmed they are, in fact, a couple by posing together at LACMA's Art+Film Gala in Los Angeles on Nov. 6, 2021. The Emmy-nominated "Normal People" heartthrob and the Grammy-nominated "Motion Sickness" singer-songwriter were first linked in the summer of 2020.

_

"Eternals" and "Dunkirk" actor Barry Keoghan and his new girlfriend, Alyson Sandro, made their red carpet debut as a couple at the London premiere of "Eternals," in which he stars as Druig, on Oct. 27, 2021. The Irish actor first introduced his love on Instagram in July 2021.

_

Madonna and her boyfriend of several years — dancer Ahlamalik Williams, who's nearly four decades her junior — made their red carpet debut as a couple at the premiere of her concert film "Madame X" in New York City on Sept. 23, 2021. They've since called it quits.

_

On Oct. 6, 2021, Alessandra Ambrosio and boyfriend Richard Lee made their official Hollywood debut at OMEGA's celebration of the new James Bond movie "No Time to Die" at the brand's Los Angeles boutique. The iconic Victoria's Secret Angel and the male model were first linked in March 2021.

_

After about three years of dating, Jake Gyllenhaal and girlfriend Jeanne Cadieu — a French model and student at Columbia University who's 15 years the actor's junior — finally made their red carpet debut as a couple at the Sept. 29, 2021, New York Film Festival premiere of "The Lost Daughter," which is his sister Maggie Gyllenhaal's feature film directorial debut. To keep the attention on his big sis, Jake and Jeanne posed together in public for the first time alongside Maggie and husband Peter Sarsgaard.

_

Music star Bad Bunny and his girlfriend — jewelry designer, model and singer Gabriela Berlingeri — finally walked their first red carpet together four years after they started dating. The couple — who got together in 2017 after meeting at a restaurant in Puerto Rico — posed for photos together at the Billboard Latin Music Awards in Coral Gables, Florida, on Sept. 23, 2021.

_

After a year of dating, model Kaia Gerber and actor Jacob Elordi made their red carpet debut as a couple at the Academy Museum of Motion Pictures' opening gala in Los Angeles on Sept. 25, 2021. Less than two months later, they split.

_

Actress-turned-designer Ashley Olsen was first linked to artist Louis Eisner in 2017, but the couple didn't make their red carpet debut as a couple until 2021 when they posed for photos at the YES 20th Anniversary Gala in Los Angeles on Sept. 23. They wed in 2022. But Ashley isn't the only Olsen sibling who went red carpet official with her love in September 2021…

_

Three months after "WandaVision" star Elizabeth Olsen let it slip that she and musician Robbie Arnett were married, the couple finally made their red carpet debut as a couple at the 2021 Emmys on Sept. 19. The actress has yet to share when she and her love — who never officially confirmed they were engaged — tied the knot.

_

Tayshia Adams and Zac Clark — who got engaged on season 16 of "The Bachelorette" in 2020 — took their sweet time making things red carpet official. The couple finally posed on their first red carpet together at the iHeartRadio Music Festival in Las Vegas on Sept. 17, 2021. They split not long after that.

_

Though they've posed together as friends a number of times over the years, it wasn't until the 2021 Met Gala on Sept. 13 that Rihanna and A$AP Rocky finally made their official red carpet debut as a couple. (Look at the way he's looking at her!) The longtime pals and collaborators faced seemingly endless questions about the nature of their relationship until People magazine finally confirmed in late 2020 that they were, in fact, an item. They're now parents together too.

_

After nearly a year of dating and months of PDA, drummer Travis Barker and reality TV star Kourtney Kardashian walked their first red carpet together at the MTV Video Music Awards in New York City on Sept. 12. They've since wed.

_

Mod Sun and Avril Lavigne made it official at the 2021 MTV VMAs in New York City on Sept. 12 — about seven months after they first sparked romance rumors after growing close while collaborating on their song "Flames" and on Avril's upcoming seventh studio album. They've since split.

_

On Sep. 10, 2021 — exactly 18 years after they called off their 2004 wedding just four days before they were set to exchange vows — Ben Affleck and Jennifer Lopez made their rekindled romance red carpet official at the 78th Venice International Film Festival premiere of his movie "The Last Duel." It was the first time they'd posed together in an official capacity since they called it quits all those years ago.

_

JoJo Siwa and girlfriend Kylie Prew, made their red carpet debut as a couple at the drive-in premiere of the former child star's Paramount+ musical comedy "The J Team" at the Rose Bowl in Pasadena, California, on Sept. 3, 2021, but they split later that fall. JoJo first introduced her sweetheart in February 2021 — just two weeks after she came out as a member of the LGBTQ+ community.

_

Adriana Lima and film producer Andre Lemmers made their red carpet debut as a couple at the 78th Venice International Film Festival premiere of "Parallel Mothers" in Italy on Sept. 1. They've since welcomed a child together.

_

Jessie J and dancer Max Pham Nguyen first posed together at the opening night of Halloween Horror Nights at Universal Studios in Universal City, California, on Sept. 9, 2021, seven months after she debuted their romance on social media. But just a month later, she revealed that they'd parted ways romantically.

_

"Selling Sunset" stars and celebrity realtors Chrishell Stause and Jason Oppenheim — whose romance was made public when they vacationed together in July 2021 — made their red carpet debut as a couple at the Los Angeles premiere of "Shang-Chi and The Legend of The Ten Rings" on Aug. 16, 2021. They've since called it quits.

_

Actor-director and Oscar-winning writer Taika Waititi and pop star Rita Ora — who were first romantically linked in April 2021 — made their red carpet debut as a couple at the premiere of his sci-fi comedy "The Suicide Squad" at the Regency Village Theatre in Los Angeles on Aug. 2, 2021. They're since married.

_

Actress-writer Lena Dunham and Peruvian English musician Luis Felber, who performs under the name Attawalpa, made their red carpet debut as a couple at a special screening of "Zola" at the Sundance Film Festival: London on Aug. 1, 2021, about two months after reports first revealed they were dating. They've since wed.

_

Nicolas Cage brought new bride Riko Shibata — he made the Japanese beauty, who's three decades his junior, wife No. 5 in February 2021 — to the Los Angeles premiere of his movie "Pig" on July 13, 2021.

_

"Tangled," "Shazam" and "The Marvelous Mrs. Maisel" actor Zachary Levi and new girlfriend Caroline Tyler made their red carpet debut as a couple at the 2021 ESPY Awards in July 2021.

_

Viewers watched "The Bachelor" star Matt James's up-and-down relationship with his final pick, Rachael Kirkconnell, play out on the ABC show and its "After the Final Rose" special in early 2021, but it wasn't until the ESPY Awards in July that year that the pair — who split and reconciled amid controversy — made their official red carpet debut as a couple.

_

Oscar winner Adrien Brody and fashion designer Georgina Chapman — the ex-wife of notorious former movie mogul Harvey Weinstein — made things red carpet official when she joined him for the premiere of his film "Clean" during the 2021 Tribeca Festival in New York City on June 19, 2021. The actor and the Marchesa brand co-founder were first romantically linked in September 2019: They reportedly started dating after meeting at mutual friend Helena Christensen's swimwear launch party in Puerto Rico the previous April.

_

On May 27, 2021, Megan Thee Stallion and Pardison Fontaine made their official debut at the iHeartRadio Music Awards in Hollywood. The couple sported coordinating gold ensembles for the star-studded event. The Grammy-winning "Savage" chart-topper first confirmed during a February Instagram Live that she and the rapper are an item. "Yeah, he my boyfriend," she said at the time.

_

Bachelor Nation's Nick Viall hit his first red carpet with girlfriend (now fiancée) Natalie Joy when they attended the MTV Movie & TV Awards: UNSCRIPTED show in Los Angeles on May 17, 2021. They went public with their romance about four months earlier.

_

Nearly a year after their romance was confirmed, "This Is Us" star Justin Hartley and Sofia Pernas — who like him is an alum of the daytime soap opera "The Young & the Restless" — made their red carpet debut as a couple at the MTV Movie & TV Awards in Los Angeles on May 16, 2021. They sparked marriage rumors as both were wearing bands on their left-hand ring fingers. The following day, a source confirmed to People magazine that the pair had indeed "recently" (and quietly!) tied the knot.

_

Just days after they first sparked romance rumors, model Paulina Porizkova and "The Trial of the Chicago 7" writer-director Aaron Sorkin confirmed they're a couple by posing together at the 2021 Academy Awards on April 25. They've since called it quits.

_

Halle Berry and her boyfriend of less than a year, Van Hunt, made their red carpet debut at the 2021 Academy Awards on April 25.

_

It was clearly a big night for red carpet debuts! "Sound of Metal" actor Riz Ahmed and his new wife, New York Times bestselling author Fatima Farheen Mirza, made their red carpet debut at the 2021 Academy Awards on April 25. The Oscar-nominated actor revealed in January that he'd secretly married the novelist after meeting in a New York City café in 2020.

_

On April 25, 2021 — after a decade as a couple — Carey Mulligan and Marcus Mumford finally made their red carpet debut at the 2021 Academy Awards. The two-time Oscar nominee and the Mumford & Sons frontman, who were childhood friends, tied the knot in 2012 and have since welcomed two children.

_

The paparazzi had already photographed Jennifer Lopez and Alex Rodriguez together on countless occasions by the time the power couple made their red carpet debut at the Met Gala in May 2017. The duo got engaged in early 2019 but called it quits two years later.

_

The late Chadwick Boseman and longtime love Taylor Simone Ledward made their red carpet debut on the red carpet at the SAG Awards in Los Angeles in January 2019. The duo secretly wed before his death in August 2020.

_

Even though they've been together since late 2017, Britney Spears and trainer Sam Asghari waited until July 2019 to make their relationship red carpet official at the premiere of "Once Upon a Time in Hollywood." They wed in 2022.

_

Kate Hudson and her boyfriend (now fiancé), Danny Fujikawa, made their red carpet debut at the premiere of "Snatched" in Los Angeles in May 2017. The following year, they welcomed daughter Rani Rose.

_

Steve Kazee and Jenna Dewan made their first red carpet outing together in October 2019 shortly after announcing that they were expecting their first child together! It took them almost a year to make things red carpet official after the world learned they were dating back in October 2018. They got engaged in early 2020 and then welcomed a son.

_

Following a brief split in late 2019 after a little more than a year of dating, actor Channing Tatum and pop star Jessie J reconciled in early 2020 and quickly took a big step forward in their relationship by making their red carpet debut at the MusiCares Person of the Year Gala in Los Angeles on Jan. 24 during Grammys weekend. They split for good less than three months later.

_

A month after they made their romance Instagram official, music star Lana Del Rey and Tulsa, Oklahoma, police officer Sean "Sticks" Larkin made their red carpet debut at the Pre-Grammy Gala and Salute to Industry Icons presented by the Recording Academy and Clive Davis party in Beverly Hills on Jan. 25, 2020. Lana and Sticks, who's an analyst on A&E's "Live PD" and the host of the network's "Live PD Presents PD Cam," went public with their romance in September 2019. They split in early 2020.

_

Sean Penn and his 32-years-younger girlfriend of more than three years, "Animal Kingdom" actress Leila George — whose father, actor Vincent D'Onofrio, is only a year older than her beau — made their official red carpet debut as a couple at the CORE Gala in Los Angeles on Jan. 15, 2020. (In October 2016 — around the time they were first linked — they were photographed at an event together, though they avoided posing as a couple.) They tied the knot in 2020 but separated the following year and divorced in 2022.

_

Just weeks after Rachel Bilson and Bill Hader were first romantically linked, they confirmed the rumors by posing together at the Golden Globe Awards on Jan. 5, 2020. The duo co-starred in 2013's "The To Do List," which was written and directed by the funnyman's then-wife, Maggie Carey. (Bill and Maggie split in 2017.) But it wasn't meant to be: Bill and Rachel called it quits later that year.

_

Another duo who made their red carpet debut at the 2020 Golden Globes on Jan. 5? Michelle Williams and Thomas Kail, who directed her on several episodes of "Fosse/Verdon." The pair secretly tied the knot in early 2020.

_

Two months after the world learned they were dating in the wake of her split from her second husband, actress-singer Zooey Deschanel and "Property Brothers" star Jonathan Scott — who met shooting a "Carpool Karaoke: The Series" segment in August 2019 — made their red carpet debut at the Critics' Choice Documentary Awards in November 2019.

_

Amazon founder and CEO Jeff Bezos and girlfriend (now fiancée) Lauren Sanchez — a former "So You Think You Can Dance" host — made their red carpet debut at an Amazon Prime Video event in Mumbai, India, on Jan. 16, 2020. The move came a year after they were first linked amid a headline-making cheating scandal when both were married to other people.

_

Model Anwar Hadid and pop star Dua Lipa first sparked romance rumors in June 2019 and became inseparable as the summer went on. They finally made their red carpet debut as a couple at the 2019 American Music Awards in November. They've since called it quits.

_

Jodie Turner-Smith and Joshua Jackson were first linked in October 2018, but it wasn't until they stepped out together at the premiere of her film "Queen & Slim" in November 2019 that they made things red carpet official. Their big debut came in the wake of marriage speculation. After tying the knot, the duo welcomed a daughter together.

_

Three months after Chris Pratt and Katherine Schwarzenegger got engaged, the pair posed together at an industry event for the very first time: The Marvel actor brought his real-life leading lady as his date to the purple carpet premiere of "Avengers: Endgame" in Los Angeles in April 2019. Two months later, they tied the knot.

_

Miranda Lambert and her husband, NYPD officer Brendan McLoughlin, made their red carpet debut at the Academy of Country Music Awards in Las Vegas in April 2019.

_

J Balvin and Argentine beauty queen Valentina Ferrer, who were first linked publicly in early 2018, made their red carpet debut during the Grammys in February 2019. Two years later, they welcomed their first child together.

_

Actress Helena Bonham Carter and Norwegian writer and professor Rye Dag Holmboe, who made headlines for being 21 years her junior, were first linked in October 2018. But it wasn't until the Harper's Bazaar Women of the Year Awards in London in October 2019 that they made their red carpet debut together.

_

Right after announcing their engagement, actor Dennis Quaid and doctoral student Laura Savoie made their romance red carpet official at the premiere of "Midway" in October 2019. It was also the perfect time for Laura — who's 39 years younger than her love — to show off her new engagement ring. They tied the knot in mid-2020.

_

Dustin Lynch debuted his romance with model Kelli Seymour at the BMI Country Awards in Nashville on Nov. 12. The following evening, she was at the country singer's side during the 2019 CMA Awards. Back in June, he confirmed he was in a new romance, though we don't know if Kelli was the lucky lady. They've since called it quits.

_

Jesse Williams and "Hit the Floor" actress girlfriend Taylour Paige made their red carpet debut at Ozwald Boateng's Harlem fashion show at the Apollo Theater in New York City in May 2019.

_

Hollywood hunk Noah Centineo stepped out with model girlfriend Alexis Ren at the UNICEF Masquerade Ball in West Hollywood in October 2019. Their official red carpet debut came about five months after they were first spotted together at a Florida airport. They called it quits the following year.

_

Less than two weeks after they announced their engagement, French financial analyst Alizee Thevenet and Duchess Kate's younger brother, James Middleton, stepped out together at the premiere of "The Elephant Queen" in London in October 2019 for their first red carpet event together. They wed in 2021.

_

Chris Lane and Lauren Bushnell revealed their relationship on the red carpet at the 66th Annual BMI Country Awards in Nashville in November 2018. They got engaged just seven months later and wed in October 2019.

_

A month after reports revealed they were dating, actor Evan Peters and pop star Halsey made their official relationship debut while in costume as Sonny Bono and Cher at the "American Horror Story" 100th Episode Celebration in October 2019. The day before, Halsey posted photos of them together wearing other costumes, making their relationship Instagram official. They called it quits in early 2020.

_

Gavin Rossdale and girlfriend Natalie Golba — a Russian model-actress who's four years younger than his oldest child, model Daisy Lowe — made their red carpet debut at the premiere of "John Wick: Chapter 3 – Parabellum" in New York City in May 2019. They've since called it quits.

_

Four months after confirming their relationship on social media, wrestler Nikki Bella and dancer Artem Chigvintsev made their red carpet debut as a couple at the Nickelodeon Kids' Choice Sports Awards in July 2019. The two weren't shy about posing or sharing a moment of PDA together. They met back when Nikki was paired with Artem on season 25 of "Dancing With the Stars" — though things didn't get romantic between the two until late 2018 after she'd split with John Cena. They're now married.

_

Romance gone public! John Cena and girlfriend Shay Shariatzadeh started dating in the spring of 2019, but they waited until his "Playing with Fire" premiere in October 2019 to make things red carpet official. The following year, they quietly tied the knot.

_

More than two months after they were first romantically linked, "Stranger Things" star David Harbour and pop star Lily Allen made their red carpet debut at the Skin Cancer Foundation Champions for Change Gala in New York City in October 2019. They wed the following year.

_

Jenni "JWoww" Farley and boyfriend Zack Clayton Carpinello, a wrestler, made their red carpet debut on the navy carpet at Hakkasan nightclub in Las Vegas in May 2019. They got engaged in 2021.

_

Shailene Woodley and her then-boyfriend, rugby player Ben Volavola, made their red carpet debut at the premiere of "Adrift" in Los Angeles in May 2018. She later moved on with Aaron Rodgers.

_

Jenny Slate and artist Ben Shattuck made their big red carpet debut at the Sundance Film Festival premiere of "The Sunlit Night" — in which she starred — in Park City, Utah, in January 2019. They're now married.

_

Aidan Turner and Caitlin Fitzgerald made their red carpet debut at the Hollywood premiere of "The Man Who Killed Hitler and Then The Bigfoot" in February 2019. The "Poldark" star and the "Masters of Sex" actress first connected in mid-2017 while shooting the WWII action-drama, in which they play lovers. They've since tied the knot.

_

Paula Patton made her red carpet debut with her then-still-married beau, Zachary Quittman, at the premiere of "Traffik" — in which she starred — in Los Angeles in April 2018.

_

Dane Cook and his much younger girlfriend (and, later, fiancée) Kelsi Taylor, made their red carpet debut at the Cinema Vanguard Award ceremony during the Santa Barbara International Film Festival in Santa Barbara, California, in February 2019.

_

Just a few months into a whirlwind romance, reality TV star Brody Jenner and model Josie Canseco made their relationship red carpet official at the Nights of the Jack VIP preview night in Calabasas, California, in October 2019. Despite looking loved up here, the couple split by the end of the month reportedly in large part because of their 14-year age difference.

_

Though they'd been photographed together before as part of their promotional duties for their Showtime series "Kidding," Jim Carrey and co-star Ginger Gonzaga proved they were more than friendly colleagues at a party for the premium cable channel's Golden Globe nominees (which featured a black carpet) at the Sunset Tower Hotel in West Hollywood in January 2019. But by the fall, they'd gone their separate ways.

_

Former Bachelor Nation franchise host Chris Harrison and "ET Live" host Lauren Zima revealed that they were an item when they hit the red carpet at Entertainment Weekly's Pre-SAG Awards party in West Hollywood in January 2019.

_

SpaceX and Tesla CEO Elon Musk and musician Grimes made their debut as a couple during the Met Gala in New York City in May 2018. They've since called it quits.

_

Chrissy Metz and percussionist Hal Rosenfeld made their red carpet debut as a couple during the Golden Globes in January 2019. In June the same year, the "This Is Us" star prompted speculation that they'd called it quits after she posted several cryptic quotes about relationship struggles on Instagram. She later confirmed they'd gone their separate ways.

_

Singer Cole Swindell and WWE Diva Barbie Blank made their red carpet debut at the Academy of Country Music Awards in Las Vegas in April 2019. But it wasn't meant to be: E! News reported that July that they'd called it quits.

_

Petra Nemcova debuted her new romance with Osham Group partner Benjamin Larretche on the silver carpet at the Hollywood for Science Gala in Los Angeles in February 2019 — less than two months after the news broke that she and fiancé No. 3, Alejandro Grimaldi, had called it quits. Later that year, Petra and Benjamin tied the knot and welcomed their first child together.

_

WWE superstars Seth Rollins and Becky Lynch made their red carpet debut at the MTV Movie & TV Awards in Santa Monica, California, in June 2019, a month after they took to social media to reveal that they were a couple. They welcomed a daughter in late 2020 and wed in 2021.
